translation: 克莉丝汀的“钢铁之环”侦查护甲
托雷斯的FO4 PA储物箱(再生)
托雷斯的FO4 PA储物箱(独特)

original: Great Khan Armorer's FO4 PA Trunk (Respawn)
translation: 大汗帮军械师的FO4 PA储物箱(再生)

original: Great Khan Armorer's FO4 PA Trunk (Unique)
translation: 大汗帮军械师的FO4 PA储物箱(独特)
内利斯军火库的FO4 PA储物箱（重生）
杜尔加的FO4 PA储物箱（独特）
死亡的钢铁兄弟会新兵

original: To anyone receiving this message... this is Paladin Aiza, service number: 6-4-0-1. This may be my last transmission.
translation: 任何收到此消息的人...我是圣骑士艾扎，服务编号：6-4-0-1。这可能是我最后一次通讯。

original: The rest of my squad is... they're gone. A few weeks ago... our comm system picked up an unusual signal.
translation: 我的其他队员...他们都死了。几周前...我们的通讯系统接收到了一个不同寻常的信号。

original: We were tasked with... locating the source of the signal... and determining... its function.
translation: 我们的任务是...找到信号的来源...并确定...它的功能。

original: It turned out to be an eyebot, unlike anything we’ve seen before. We believed its tech would prove useful.
translation: 结果是个眼球机器人，我们以前从未见过。我们认为它的技术会很有用。

original: We tracked it down as far as Utah. Its last known coordinates were: 1, 2, Sierra, Uniform, Golf, 2, 4, 2, 5, 2, 2, 2, 6.
translation: 我们追踪它到了犹他州。它最后已知的位置坐标是：1，2，赛拉，制服，高尔夫，2，4，2，5，2，2，2，6。

original: We were ambushed... tribals... highly skilled and trained. I was fortunate enough to make it out alive.
translation: 我们被伏击了...是土著人...他们技能高超，训练有素。我很幸运地活了下来。

original: Managed to find a cave... it's about 8 clicks West of the eyebot's last known location.
translation: 设法找到了一个洞穴...距离眼球机器人最后已知位置西边大约8公里。

original: I'm alive - for now, at least. Think it's safe to say I'm not in Kansas anymore.
translation: 我还活着——至少现在是的。我觉得我现在可以安全地说，我不再在堪萨斯州了。

original: I've taken care of the Van Graffs.
translation: 我已经摆平了范格拉夫家族。

original: Well done. This is a small step in the right direction, but it's damn good to move forward again. Now, I believe congratulations are in order.
translation: 很好，虽然只是一小步，但起码我们是有所动作了。我必须要向你表示祝贺。

original: It is my honor to bestow upon you the title of Paladin of the Brotherhood, for your meritorious service in its name.
translation: 鉴于你为兄弟会所做的贡献，我很荣幸地授予你兄弟会圣骑士称号。

original: Normally, there'd be a ceremony and such, but everyone is too busy at the moment for such frivolity.
translation: 通常还要举行个仪式，但现在大家都忙得不可开交，实在是顾不得这些繁文缛节。

original: I can give you this, however. Your very own suit of power armor. We can't spare our best, but I had the knights assemble this one for your use.
translation: 不过，我还是要把这个交给你。你的专属动力装甲。虽然性能不算卓越，但为了能适合你，骑士们还是动了一番脑筋的。

original: Which reminds me, you don't even know how to use these, do you?
translation: 我想起来了，你压根还不知道怎么用，对吧？

original: I installed the device up at Black Mountain, as instructed.
translation: 我已经依照你的吩咐在黑山顶上装了发射器。

original: Yes, we've already started receiving telemetry from it. This will be a great help in our future efforts, and I thank you.
translation: 是的，我们已经接收到遥测信号了。这对我们今后的工作大有裨益，谢谢你。

original: Now then, it is my great honor to bestow upon you the title of Paladin of the Brotherhood, for meritorious service above and beyond the call of duty.
translation: 现在，我很荣幸地授予你兄弟会圣骑士的称号，以表彰你的卓越贡献，以及从中体现出的忠诚。

original: I'm afraid a formal ceremony was out of the question given our current state, but I hope this will make up for it.
translation: 恐怕以我们目前的条件，没有办法为你举行正规的晋升仪式，不过希望这件东西能够弥补你的遗憾。

original: I had the knights refurbish a suit of our power armor for your use. It's one of the earlier models, but it should serve you well.
translation: 我让骑士们为你修整了一套动力装甲。这套的型号有些旧，不过性能依旧良好。

original: Now, I suppose I'm going to have to show you how to use it, aren't I?
translation: 那么，要我说明一下它该如何使用吗？

original: Well, I'll be damned. That makes 100 ingots you found. And here I remember thinking you'd be lucky to bring back any at all.
translation: 我会遭天谴，那值100块钢锭。我记得我在想，你带回来这么多根本就是走运。

original: Ain't no question, you earned the treasure of my collection. This armor goes all the way back to when the Brotherhood tried to wipe out The Pitt.
translation: 很好，你挣到了我收集来的宝贝。这套装甲和兄弟会想要摧毁匹兹堡时的那种款式完全相同。

original: Some of the tribals who worshipped Ashur made it to look like their god. Try it on, and you'll feel a little like a god, yourself!
translation: 一些部落崇拜阿舒尔，把他尊为他们的神。试穿一下，你自己也会觉得有点像神的！

original: Well, I'll be damned. That makes 100 ingots you found. And here I remember thinking you'd be lucky to bring back any at all.
translation: 我会遭天谴，那值100块钢锭。我记得我在想，你带回来这么多根本就是走运。

original: Ain't no question, you earned the treasure of my collection. This armor goes all the way back to when the Brotherhood tried to wipe out The Pitt.
translation: 很好，你赚到了我收集来的宝贝。这套装甲和兄弟会想要摧毁匹兹堡时的那种款式完全相同。

original: Some of the tribals who worshipped Ashur made it to look like their god. Try it on, and you'll feel a little like a god, yourself!
translation: 一些部落崇拜阿舒尔，把他尊为他们的神。试穿一下，你自己也会觉得有点像神的！
避难所科技公司管理部
